    • statusCode

      public static <T> Criteria<java.net.http.HttpResponse<T>> statusCode(int code)
      Builds criteria to match status code of a response.
      Type Parameters:
      T - is a type of response body
      Parameters:
      code - is the expected status code.
      Returns:
      criteria.

    • bodyMatches

      public static <T> Criteria<java.net.http.HttpResponse<T>> bodyMatches(String description, Predicate<? super T> predicate)
      Builds criteria to match status code of a response fluently.
      Type Parameters:
      T - is a type of response body
      Parameters:
      description - description of the expectation
      predicate - is the expectation that response body should meet
      Returns:
      criteria

      Parameters:

      criteria.

    • uriMatches

      public static <T> Criteria<java.net.http.HttpResponse<T>> uriMatches(String expression)
      Builds criteria to match uri of a response.
      Type Parameters:
      T - is a type of response body
      Parameters:
      expression - is a substring that uri of a response is supposed to have. It is possible to pass reg exp pattern that uri should fit.
      Returns:
      criteria.

    • headerValue

      public static <T> Criteria<java.net.http.HttpResponse<T>> headerValue(String name, String value)
      Checks header of response. It is expected that response has defined header with value that contains defined string.
      Type Parameters:
      T - is a type of response body
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of header response is supposed to have
      value - is the value of header response is supposed to have
      Returns:
      criteria

    • headerValueMatches

      public static <T> Criteria<java.net.http.HttpResponse<T>> headerValueMatches(String name, String valueExpression)
      Checks header of response. It is expected that response has defined header with value that contains string with defined substring / regex.
      Type Parameters:
      T - is a type of response body
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of header response is supposed to have
      valueExpression - is the substring the header value is supposed to have or the RegExp the header value is predicted to match
      Returns:
      criteria
